cast.name: 帕特里克·伯利奇 Patrick Bouchitey
维克多·弗拉代特 Victor Fradet

introduction: This is the end of summer. Three teenagers, Greg, his brother Thomas and his friend David have accepted to do up a seaside villa and make the holidays last. While enjoying freedom and its limits toward laws, they meet an 18 years old illegal immigrant from Morocco, named Hadj. At the end of summer, these three teenagers make their first steps to adulthood. The last sequence shows Hadj reaching his bus, helped by Thomas. He escapes the seaside village to join his sister in the North.
